story_arceus_06_07000/2401_1101_0200_20:
Once again, the Arceus Cup is about to
begin!
story_arceus_06_07000/2401_1101_0300_20:
It’s the same matchup as in the first—
but flipped! Cynthia now stands before
Volo, who’s challenged her to a rematch!
story_arceus_06_07000/2401_1101_0400_20:
These two have a score to settle!
Who will come out on top?!
story_arceus_06_07000/2401_1001_0500_10: Don’t expect me to let you win twice.
story_arceus_06_07000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Then come at us with everything
you’ve got!
story_arceus_06_07000/2401_1001_0700_10: I won’t hold back a single ounce.
story_arceus_06_07000/2401_1001_0800_10:
I, Cynthia, accept your challenge! There
won’t be any letup from me!
story_arceus_06_07000/2401_1001_1100_10: If she can do it, so can I!
story_arceus_06_07000/2401_1001_1400_10: So you refuse to acknowledge me?!
story_arceus_06_07000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Seems it’s still too soon to awaken your
arc suit.
story_arceus_06_07000/2401_1001_1600_10:
When I battled you before, you treated
your Pokémon like tools, and that hasn’t
changed.
story_arceus_06_07000/2401_1001_1700_10:
You’ll never build a true bond with your
Pokémon that way!
story_arceus_06_07000/2401_1001_1900_10: If you refuse to accept me...
story_arceus_06_07000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Then you’ve left me no choice but to
FORCE you to!
